SELECT A.CB_IDX , A.BC_IDX , A.SUB_CONT , A.NAME_CONT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT , CASE WHEN ANS_YN_CONT = '22000200' THEN '답변없음' WHEN 0 < ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX AND CMR.AUDIT_YN IN ('27000100','27000200','27000300') ) THEN '답변완료' WHEN 1 = ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX ) AND 1 = ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX AND CMR.TEMP_YN = 'Y' ) THEN '답변완료'
WHEN 0 < ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX ) AND ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX ) = ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX AND (CMR.TEMP_YN = 'Y') ) THEN '부서답변' WHEN 0 < ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX AND CMR.TEMP_YN = 'N' ) THEN '중간답변' WHEN 0 < ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX ) THEN '처리중' WHEN 0 >= ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX ) THEN '접수중' END AS MW_STATUS_CONT
FROM ( SELECT * FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT A WHERE CB_IDX = '414' AND BC_DEL_YN = 'N' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX
AND CMR.MC_DEPT_CD = #{mcDeptCd}
)
AND REG_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{scRegDtSt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{scRegDtEd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.CB_IDX , A.BC_IDX , B.CB_NAME , A.SUB_CONT , A.NAME_CONT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT , A.COUNT_CONT FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT A , EZ_CMS_BBS B , EZ_BBS_CONFIG C WHERE A.CB_IDX = B.CB_IDX AND B.CB_IDX = C.CB_IDX AND A.BC_DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.BBS_TEMPLET_GBN IN('16050100','16050200','16050300','16050400','16050500','16050600') AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.REG_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{scRegDtSt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{scRegDtEd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC )A WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT A , EZ_CMS_BBS B , EZ_BBS_CONFIG C WHERE A.CB_IDX = B.CB_IDX AND B.CB_IDX = C.CB_IDX AND A.BC_DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.BBS_TEMPLET_GBN IN('16050100','16050200','16050300','16050400','16050500','16050600') AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.REG_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{scRegDtSt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{scRegDtEd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RI_IDX , RI_TITLE , (SELECT CU_NAME FROM EZ_CMS_USER WHERE CU_ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_ID , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT , RI_CONFIRM_YN FROM EZ_RESERVATION_INDEX A WHERE RI_TYPE = 'F' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND USER_REG = 'Y'
AND REG_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{scRegDtSt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{scRegDtEd}||'235900', 'YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS')
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC )A WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RI_IDX , RI_TITLE , (SELECT CU_NAME FROM EZ_CMS_USER WHERE CU_ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_ID , TO_CHAR(REG_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT , RI_CONFIRM_YN FROM EZ_RESERVATION_INDEX A WHERE RI_TYPE = 'E' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND USER_REG = 'Y'
AND REG_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{scRegDtSt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{scRegDtEd}||'235900', 'YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS')
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC )A WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
